title: BBC Our World 2015 A Bumpy Road to Rio 720p x264 AAC HDTV MVGrou
description:
A Bumpy Road to Rio

Sociopolitical Documentary hosted by Nikki Fox, published by BBC broadcasted as part of BBC Our World series in 2015 - English narration. 
http://docuwiki.net/images/4/4e/A-Bumpy-Road-to-Rio-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------
Rio de Janeiro is gearing up for its big year. The famous Brazilian city will host the 2016 Olympic and Paralympic Games. Elite disabled athletes from across the world will gather for what the organisers say will be the biggest Paralympics ever - and the city is being prepared to welcome them. But what is everyday life like in Rio for disabled people - and how will these Paralympic preparations affect them? The BBC's Disability Affairs Correspondent Nikki Fox travels to Rio to find out for Our World.
